awards:
第8届FIRST青年电影展(2014)
　　竞赛 最佳剧情长片(提名) 郭大路
　　竞赛 最佳导演(提名) 郭大路
　　竞赛 最佳演员(提名) 戈志国
introduction: 一个男人进城在舞厅寻找做舞女的老婆，没想到老婆和人跑了，他却爱上了一个想骗取高额意外死亡保险的舞女。最后舞女被杀，为了照顾舞女的儿子，这个男人穿起老婆留下的红色高跟鞋和黑色丝袜在舞厅做起了舞女。A man ,looking for his wife who lived with as a dance girl, found that his wife went away with another man and finally fell in love with a dancing girl who aims to cheat for large-amount accidental insurance.At last, the dance girl was killed. To take care the child, the man dressed him up in the sexy clothes left by her wife and became a dance girl in the ballroom.
